column4: well ifconfig reports it has an IP address that it got via DHCP. So the hardware must be up as ifconfig also reports its been sending and getting data. But I cannot accsess any network resource or any local ip address or any local webservers so its like its not even on the network.
there are 3 rules setup in ip tables erm could take some typing into here because I dont have a pastebin. Lets see if remote ssh works
pinging the box remotley I get nothing
I dont have internet accsess on the box as its a network issue
thats the content of my ip tables
never had anything like this before. Any way to check the itnerface is actually working?
ifconfig shows its working but I cannot get accsess to any network resource but ifconfig shows its sending and reciving data
if I do it by IP still nothing
I cannot ping, tracert anything including local ips
216.239.39.99 in browser dosnt bring up google?
is it risky?  any reason to refrain?
or partition magic if you have it
Working with partition tables always carries some risk
In this case. slight. but you should have a backup..
I resized my ntfs this week with no problems, but I scanned it and defragged first just to help
